Created an attachment (id=17460)
Class with the problem
Please explain how do you generate the exception you mentionned ?

I simply save the file : It is build automatically and no further action is 
required.

The exception appears in the Problems view.

Can you provide the exception stack trace ? (maybe by looking into .log file).
Also which Eclipse build are you using ?
